document_data.image: The Shining Lands - The Shining South 1993.jpg
document_data.caption: A map showing the River Heldar within the Shining Lands.
document_data.name: River Heldar
document_data.mainbody: The '''River Heldar''' was a small river found in the middle of [[Durpar]] in the [[Shining Lands]] of the [[Shining South]].
document_data.Geography: The river originated within the [[Dustwall Mountains]], flowing south on a brief course before meeting the [[Golden Water]].
document_data.Description: Durpar's capital, [[Heldapan]], was found along its eastern bank.
